website_summaries.verdict: This product is the smallest on our list, yet handy and accurate  with two slope proportions for hardwood and softwood.
pros: Very small and lightweight dovetail marker with 1-to-5 slope for softwoods and 1-to-8 slope for hardwoods

customer_reviews.title: You need one!
customer_reviews.text: As I have not yet made a jig for my router table being able to mark out my dovetails was something I was in need of this little tool works great and in conjunction with my machinists ruler I get very accurate results, this is well built and very solid. a must have for anyone who has to layout dovetails or is just learning how to.
customer_reviews.author: Hopper55

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I like it's simplicity. I haven't had a chance to use it yet but it's not going to be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: C. Clopton

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now! A great jig for your collection.
customer_reviews.text: I have always desired a true dovetail jig. I made my own years ago but it is now what worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Solid little tool
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Solid little tool, with great markings for measurements. Instantly improved my dovetail cutting skills. I would recommend for anyone who isn't a professional like Paul Sellers, to have one of these tools.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was exactly what I expected and perfect for his next project
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wood working father. It was exactly what I expected and perfect for his next project, drawers!
customer_reviews.author: Aundrea McNeil

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly as promised. I tied paracord through the hole so I can hang it up on a peg board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dovetail jig
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd dovetail jig. Couldn't find the previous one. One thing I have learned in the past is, but a 2nd one and the 1st typically shows up somehow. Found it!!! 😑
customer_reviews.author: BobTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Nothing fancy
customer_reviews.text: It's fine for what it is, but I thought it would be bigger. No problem though, it does what it is supposed to do, it's durable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Roushia

customer_reviews.title: Best!!!
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work very well on my first project, I think it is a good deal and quality
customer_reviews.author: MARK

customer_reviews.title: This is great. I prefer making dovetails by hand as opposed ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I prefer making dovetails by hand as opposed to with a router and this make it much faster than using my bevel
customer_reviews.author: Devin Crider

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: My only compliant is that I wish it were made of a heavier metal. Otherwise, very well made.
customer_reviews.author: tejanoman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to file down some sharp edges that stuck out.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jones

product_meta.title: Dovetail Marker Dovetail Marking Jig saddle Marker - Billet Aluminum for up to 1 Inch Wood -Hand Cut Wood Joints Gauge Dovetail Guide Tool - 415-9307
feature_bullets: 1:5 slope for softwoods and 1:8 slope for hardwoods
The dovetail fixture is machined from black anodized aluminum CNC with contrast laser-etched measurement marks.

The dovetail marking machine goes through a thorough quality control process to ensure that the marking line is accurate and the tool has been completely deburred and processed to specifications. CNC precision machining. This dovetail tool will never gouge or damage your project
The rectangular aluminum block at the rear of the marker ensures your dovetail is always marked at right angles to the workpiece
Dovetail marking allows you to consistently and accurately mark softwood or hardwood applications, reducing the frustration of cutting dovetails.
